level.heading: LOCKER OR DRESSING ROOM FOR EMPLOYEES (§ 14-1118)

level.text: Adequate lockers or dressing rooms shall be provided for the clothing of male and female employees.
Soiled linens, coats, and aprons shall be kept in vermin-proof containers provided for that purpose.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: The Housing Regulations of the District of Columbia, 5G DCRR § 4217, Commissioners’ Order 55-1503 (August 11, 1955).
